name: Classe300EOSwithNetatmo
0:
”Alexa, ask BTicino to answer”
”Alexa, ask BTicino to terminate the call”
”Alexa, ask BTicino to show me the camera”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. ticino
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill only works on Classe 300EOS with Netatmo by BTicino.
To use this skill, you need to link with your Netatmo account, the same used during the configuration of the device.
If you haven't yet configured your Classe 300EOS with Netatmo, follow the instructions on the display.

This skill allows you to control video door entry functions.
Try saying: 
"Alexa, answer the call",
"Alexa, terminate the call",
"Alexa, show me the camera".

To control the locks and other connected products by BTicino, such as Living Now smart controls, please use the skill Legrand - Netatmo - BTicino
